short_summary: Extension of Post-RFP Activity eKMS tender closing time
description: This amendment is to extend the closing date for receipt of survey responses from February 11th, 2023, 2:00 PM EST, to February 15th. 2023, 2:00 PM EST.
full_summary:
================================

### Post-RFP Activity eKMS Tender Notice

#### Technical Notice Reference: SSC-23-00021625

The following is a technical notice for the Post-RFP Activity eKMS tender contest, solicitation number BPM018022/21625.

### Tender Overview

A competitive tender contest was initiated by Shared Services Canada, with the solicitation number BPM018022/21625. The contest is part of the eKMS service, and bidders are expected to provide survey services for this service.

### Tender Amendment and Closing Date

This announcement notifies respondents that the tender closing date for the survey responses has been extended. Initially, respondents were required to submit their responses by February 11, 2023, 14:00 HNE. However, due to a request for extension, the revised closing date is now set for February 15, 2023, 14:00 HNE.

[**View Tender Attachments**](#)

Attachments for this tender contest include further documents regarding the Post-RFP Activity eKMS service. To view the attachments, please follow the link [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/B3F577E1-80B7-49CA-AEF1-9CBD973EAC77).

### Tender Contacts

For more information about this tender contest or accessing the attachments, please contact Costas Kafenzakis at:

*   Email: costas.kafenzakis@ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   Phone: 6134622070
*   Fax: 6139606007

### Important Details

*   Title of Tender: SSC Post-RFP Activity eKMS - Amendment 002
*   Solicitation Number: BPM018022/21625
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Closing Date: February 11, 2023, 14:00 HNE (suspended due to extended date, new closing date is February 15, 2023, 14:00 HNE)

Please note that the tender details will be available only until the tender closing date. All inquiries or communications regarding the tender should be directed to the contact information listed above.

### Language and Currency Recap

*   French and English shall be considered official languages for this tender contest. As such, the full description of the procurement, and associated documents, is available for both languages.
*   The procurement price is expected to be in Canadian Dollars (CAD). Previous
